channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I am increasingly resentful’: My husband of 10 years has $1 million and cars worth $200K. Why won’t he give me money?
item.description: “I maintain the household, walk the dogs and cook regular meals for us both.”

item.title: ‘I love my work’: I’m a 61-year-old Chicago public-school teacher with a $60K annual pension. Is it safe?
item.description: “I am aware that my pension as a Chicago public school teacher is dependent on factors that are very much in flux right now.”

item.title: ‘She’ll let him live there for free’: My sister wants to buy our impoverished brother’s house. Is that a bad idea?
item.description: “Her only concern is that it will show up as an asset or rental property on her end.”

item.title: Trump’s $1 million ‘gold card’ immigration program is close to launching. Here’s what’s ahead.
item.description: “This program is not going to be as easy as the administration initially claimed,” says one expert in immigration law.

item.title: ‘I’m desperately trying to do right by everyone’: I’m giving my son $250K and my daughter 50% of a property. Is that fair?
item.description: “My son had no financial input into that property.”

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
